scripts.collect:base:files: rm app/static/include.txt && find base -type f >> app/static/include.txt
scripts.prepare:base: npm run compile:base:files && npm run collect:base:files
scripts.dev: npm run prepare:base && npm run app dev
scripts.build: npm run server build && npm run client build
scripts.cleanup: npm run --prefix ./client/ cleanup && npm run --prefix ./server/ cleanup && rm -rf ./build/
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run tests setup && npm run client setup && npm run server setup
scripts.build:base:old:
npm run compile:tsc -- -out app/static/code/lib.ts -lib es2020 --module amd --declaration $(find base -type f | tr '
' ',
	')
